name: "Backstab" Bindo Gearbomb
effect: 1, [Activate] ==> Exhaust target card. If you exhausted an Arena card this way, it can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
"Fight for glory, fight for prestige; as long as you pay, we can fill your need!"

name: "Bladehands" Spigotgulp
effect:
Escape Artist (When this ally becomes targeted by an opposing card or effect, you may put it into its owner's hand.)
If you would draw a card, you may skip drawing it instead.
When you skip drawing a card this way, turn target resource face down.
"You shouldn't try so hard. It's just going to hurt more."

name: A Taste of Divinity
effect: Talent: Holy
"Tell me if you want another dose, mon!" - Witch Doctor Koo'zar

name: Adam Eternum
effect: Pay 2 or remove an honor counter from a card you control ==> Remove Adam from the game. Put him into play at the start of the next turn.
"By the power of Greybeard, I HAVE THE POWER!"

name: Addisyn the Untouchable
effect: Talent: Protection
Professions: Engineering, Jewelcrafting
"Was that supposed to hurt?"

name: Alterac Valley
effect:
When you play a card, add an honor counter.
On your turn: [Activate], Remove eight honor counters ==> Put target ally card from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control.
The Frostwolf clan and the Stormpike Expedition battle for supremacy of this territory.

name: Apostle of Argus
effect: On your turn: Exhaust your hero ==> Your hero heals 1 damage from target hero or ally, or 4 if an opponent when first this game.
A relic from the eredar home world.

name: Arathi Basin
effect:
When you play a card, add an honor counter.
[Activate], Remove five honor counters ==> Draw a card.
"Controlling vital resource points is the key to victory. Control all five, and you are virtually guaranteed it." - Loraala

name: Arcane Warding
effect: Talent: Arcane, Protection
"I hope you brought more to this fight that just your wits." - Cerripha Sunstreak

name: Arcanite Steam-Pistol
effect:
When you strike with Arcanite Steam-Pistol, youre hero has long-range this combat.
When a hero is dealt damage with Arcanite Steam-Pistol, if its controller went first this game, he destroys one of his resources.
The intricacies of this weapon would make even the most brilliant goblins and gnomes jealous.

name: Backlash
effect: Talent: Destruction
"I want yo uto hit me as hard as you can."

name: Baelgond Soulgrace
effect: When Baelgond enters play, reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
"If you find yourself in a pinch, lad, greater focus will bring you greater returns."

name: Bangle of Endless Blessings
effect:
When Bangle of Endless Blessings enters play, put each face-down resource into its owner's hand.
Players can't place resources face down.
"Who would have thought that such a small item could provide such a great power?" - Moonshadow

name: Berserker Bracers
effect: When your hero is dealt damage, ready Berserker Bracers.
"Let yourself lose controlâ€¦" - Kelm Hargunth

name: Blackened Spear
effect: Blackened Spear has +1 ATK if an ally with arcane torrent is in your party. This is also true for berserking, hardiness, war stomp, and will of the forsaken.

name: Blackout Truncheon
effect: When Blackout Truncheon enters play, exhaust target hero or ally. That character can't ready during its controller's next ready step.

name: Bleed
effect: Talent: Arms
"You've got a little something on your armor." - Kaniya

name: Blessed Defense
effect: Talent: Protection
"You can try all you want, but you aren't taking me down!" - Addisyn

name: Blessing of Kings
effect: Talent: Protection
"And you thought things couldn't get any worse for youâ€¦" - Addisyn

name: Blind Faith
effect: Talent: Discipline

name: Blood Frenzy
effect: Talent: Arms
Be prepared for the beating of a lifetime.

name: Blood Knight Haeleth
effect:
Protector
Once per turn: 2 ==> Haeleth heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
"Is that all you need?"

name: Bloodwatcher Denissa
effect: When an opposing ally enters play, Denissa deals 1 ranged damage to it.
"Take one more step and you will become my shooting post."

name: Bonefist Gauntlets
effect: [Activate] ==> You pay 2 less the next time you strike with a weapon this turn.

name: Boum the Bloodseeker
effect: Talent: Beast Mastery
Professions: Engineering, Jewelcrafting

name: Brittilize
effect: Talent: Frost

name: Bulwark of the Amani Empire
effect: Bulwark of the Amani Empire can prevent damage that would be dealt to allies in your party.

name: Burgle
effect: Talent: Subtlety
"Thanks for everything!" - Timmo Shadestep

name: Call to Arms: Alterac Valley
effect:
Pay 4 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. You pay 3 less to complete your next quest this turn. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.
"Critical troop deployments are necessary on a day by day basis." - Alliance Brigadier General

name: Call to Arms: Arathi Basin
effect:
Pay 5 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put all revealed ability, ally, and equipment cards into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.

name: Call to Arms: Eye of the Storm
effect:
On your turn, pay 3 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card, and target hero or ally can't ready during its controller's next ready step. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.
"We must show the enemy that we will fight them wherever we find them." - Horde Warbringer

name: Call to Arms: Warsong Gulch
effect:
If a protector is in your party, pay 2 to complete this quest.
Reward: Draw a card. You may add an honor counter to a Battleground card you control.
"Today we have an opportunity to drive the enemy from our lands once and for all." - Horde Warbringer

name: Capture a Mine
effect:
Pay 1 to complete this quest.
Reward: Reveal the top three cards of your deck. Put a revealed location or quest card into hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.

name: Carnage
effect: Talent: Assassination

effect: Talent: Combat, Enhancement

effect: Talent: Balance

name: Chain Purge

name: Charkov
effect:
Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.)

name: Collateral Damage

name: Concentration Aura
effect: Talent: Holy

name: Convert

name: Convocation
effect: Talent: Restoration

name: Corvus Promaethon

name: Crackling Staff

name: Cremate
effect: Talent: Destruction

name: Crusty
effect:
Protector

effect: Talent: Affliction

name: Curse of Weakness

effect:
Protector

Will of the Forsaken (This ally can't leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.)

effect: Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.)

name: Deathstalker Leanna
effect:
Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.)

effect:
If an opponent completed a quest this turn, pay 1 to complete this quest.

name: Dethvir the Malignant
effect:
Undead Hero Required
Will of the Forsaken
If another hero or ally in your party would be dealt damage, you may have it be dealt to Dethvir instead.

name: Dimzer the Prestidigitator
effect:
Gnome Hero Required
Escape Artist

name: Dominate
effect: Talent: Demonology

name: Don Alejandro's Money Belt
effect: [Activate] ==> You may reveal an equipment card from your hand. If you do, put it into your resource row face down and exhausted.

name: Dorn the Tranquil
effect: Talent: Restoration
Professions: Mining, Engineering

name: Drek'Thar
effect:
Protector
You pay 1 less to play Drek'Thar for each honor counter on cards you control.
1, Remove an honor counter from a card you control ==> Put a Wolf ally token into play with 1 [Melee] ATK / 1 health and ferocity.

Protector

When you play a card, add an honor counter.

effect: You pay 3 less to strike with Firemaul of Destruction if an opposing card was destroyed this turn.

effect:
When you place a resource, you may put the top card of your deck into your resource row face down and ready.

effect:
Gnome Hero Required
Gnomes in your party are irradiated. (When this character deals combat damage to an ally that's not irradiated, it becomes irradiated.)

name: Grips of Damnation
effect:
At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 melee damage to each hero.
2 ==> This turn, prevent all damage that would be dealt this way. Any player can use the power.

name: Grizzly Defender
effect: Talent: Feral

name: Gromble the Apt
effect:
Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.)

name: Grudum, Trove Guardian
effect:
Protector
Find Treasure (When this ally enters play, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card.)

effect: At the start of your turn, choose a hero or ally in your party. Other characters can't attack this turn.

name: Hatchet Totem

effect:

name: Heartrazor
effect: 1, Destroy Heartrazor ==> Target hero can't deal damage this turn.

effect: You pay 1 less to play Hellforged Halberd if an ally with diplomacy is in your party. This is also try for escape artist, inspiring presence, shadowmeld, and find treasure.

name: Holy Strike

effect:

name: Siaranna the Fickle
effect: When a player plays an ability, he gains control of Siaranna.

effect:
Will of the Forsaken (This ally cant leave play unless it has fatal damage or 0 health.)
When Sivandra enters play, draw a card, then destroy an ally in your party.

effect: Escape Artist (When this ally becomes targeted by an opposing card or effect, you may put it into its owner's hand.)

Dwarf Hero Required
Find Treasure

name: Split Open
effect: Talent: Fury

name: Steelhawk Crossbow
effect:
When you strike with Steelhawk Crossbow, your hero has long-range this combat.
At the start of your turn, exhaust Steelhawk Crossbow unless you pay 1.

When you play a card, add an honor counter. If there are six or more on Stormpike Insignia, destroy it.

effect: At the start of your turn, each player chooses an ally in his party. Destroy all other allies.

name: Undercity

Undead Hero Required

Protector
You pay 1 less to play Vanndar for each honor counter on cards you control.
1, Remove an honor counter from a card you control ==> Each player destroys one of his resources.

effect:
Your hero has dual wield.

effect:
When combat damage is dealt with one or more of your weapons, ready all of your weapons.
[Activate] ==> Your hero deals 2 frost damage to target hero or ally. A character dealt damage this way can't attack or protect this turn.

effect: Players pay 2 more to play cards.

effect:
Protector

effect: 2, Destroy Wub's Cursed Hexblade ==> Destroy target ally. If an opponent went first this game, put a card with the same name as that ally from a graveyard into your party.
